languages.text: Гадание на Таро Императора и пролитой крови над плотью предателей указало на приближенного к Немезиту человека. Изменник — Корабельный исповедник Адальберт.

traits.locale_text: Гадание на Таро Императора и пролитой крови над плотью предателей указало на приближенного к Немезиту человека. Изменник — Корабельный исповедник Адальберт.

languages.text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.
languages.original_text: Гадание на Таро Императора и пролитой крови над плотью предателей указало на приближенного к Немезиту человека. Изменник — Корабельный исповедник Адальберт.

traits.locale_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot, blood of the innocent and flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is the ship's confessor Adalbert.
A divination using the Emperor's Tarot, blood of the innocent and flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is the ship's confessor Adalbert.
A divination using the Emperor's Tarot, blood of the innocent, and the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is the ship's confessor Adalbert.
A divination using the Emperor's Tarot, blood of the innocent, and the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is the ship's confessor Adalbert.
A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.
A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

languages.text: Eine Prophetie mit dem Tarot des Imperators und über dem Fleisch der Verräter vergossenes Blut hat auf einen Mann hingewiesen, der Nemesit nahesteht. Der Verräter ist Adalbert, der Konfessor des Schiffs.
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

traits.locale_text: Eine Prophetie mit dem Tarot des Imperators und über dem Fleisch der Verräter vergossenes Blut hat auf einen Mann hingewiesen, der Nemesit nahesteht. Der Verräter ist Adalbert, der Konfessor des Schiffs.

languages.text: Un ritual de adivinación con el tarot del Emperador y la sangre derramada sobre la carne de los traidores han revelado la identidad de un hombre afín a Nemesitio. El traidor es Adalbert, el confesor de la nave.
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

traits.locale_text: Un ritual de adivinación con el tarot del Emperador y la sangre derramada sobre la carne de los traidores han revelado la identidad de un hombre afín a Nemesitio. El traidor es Adalbert, el confesor de la nave.

languages.text: 皇帝陛下の占い札と裏切り者の血痕を使ったディビネーションで、ネメサイトに近い男が浮かび上がった。裏切り者はアダルバート、船の聴罪師である。
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝陛下の占い札と裏切り者の血痕を使ったディビネーションで、ネメサイトに近い男が浮かび上がった。裏切り者はアダルバート、船の聴罪師である。

languages.text: 绮贝菈通过帝皇的塔罗牌与溅在背叛者身上的鲜血，占卜到了某个与涅墨斯特关系密切的人。这个叛徒就是船上的告解神父阿达伯特。
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈通过帝皇的塔罗牌与溅在背叛者身上的鲜血，占卜到了某个与涅墨斯特关系密切的人。这个叛徒就是船上的告解神父阿达伯特。

languages.text: Un rite divinatoire accompli avec le tarot de l'Empereur et le sang versé sur la chair des traîtres a permis d'identifier un proche de Némésite. Le traître n'est autre qu'Adalbert, le confesseur du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.

traits.locale_text: Un rite divinatoire accompli avec le tarot de l'Empereur et le sang versé sur la chair des traîtres a permis d'identifier un proche de Némésite. Le traître n'est autre qu'Adalbert, le confesseur du vaisseau.

languages.text: İmparator'un Tarotu ve hainlerin eti üzerine saçılan kanla açığa çıkan bir kehanet, Nemezit'e yakın olan bir adamı işaret etti. Hain, geminin günah çıkarıcısı Adalbert.
languages.original_text: A divination using the Emperor's Tarot and blood spilt over the flesh of the betrayers has pointed to a man close to Nemesite. The traitor is Adalbert, the ship's confessor.
